string.name: title_schedule
string.translation_description: The title for the schedule screen where user can see their schedule for Google I/O.

string.name: title_feed
string.translation_description: The title for the feed screen where user can all the updates from Google I/O team.

string.name: title_map
string.translation_description: The title for the map screen where user can see the map of the venue.

string.name: title_info
string.translation_description: The title for the info screen where user can see various information, such as FAQ and travel info.

string.name: filters
string.translation_description: The label for the button to filter sessions by their topics, room, and so on.

string.name: category_heading_tracks
string.translation_description: Label in the filters panel above session topics (Android, Cloud, etc.)

string.name: category_heading_types
string.translation_description: Label in the filters panel above event types (Sessions, Codelabs, etc.)

string.name: clear_all
string.translation_description: The label for the button to clear all the filter conditions.

string.name: agenda
string.translation_description: The title for the agenda screen where user can see all the sessions they plan to attend.

string.name: event_starred
string.translation_description: The message shown when user adds an event to their schedule.

resources.string: Event added to your starred items

string.name: event_unstarred
string.translation_description: The message shown when user removes an event from their schedule.

string.name: event_star_error
string.translation_description: The message shown for an error when user tries to add an event.

resources.string: Error adding event to starred items

string.name: reservation_error
string.translation_description: The message shown for an error when user is trying to reserve a session attendance.

string.name: reservation_request_succeeded
string.translation_description: The message shown when user tries to reserve a seat for a session.

string.name: reservation_cancel_succeeded
string.translation_description: The message shown when user has canceled their reservation for a session.

string.name: reservation_new
string.translation_description: The message shown when user's reservation is confirmed by the system.

string.name: waitlist_new
string.translation_description: The message shown when user is added to the waitlist of a session reservation.

string.name: got_it
string.translation_description: The label for dismissing a information messages.

string.name: rate_session
string.translation_description: The label for the button to rate the session by 5 stars

string.name: menu_item_session_location
string.translation_description: The label for the location of the session.

string.name: session_detail_speakers_header
string.translation_descriptions: The label for the session speakers.

string.name: session_detail_related_header
string.translation_description: The label for the events related to this session.

string.name: info_title
string.translation_description: The title for the info screen where user can see various information, such as FAQ and travel info.

string.name: event_title
string.translation_description: The title for the tab that shows interesting events, such as sessions and office hours.

string.name: travel_title
string.translation_description: The title for the tab that shows travel information, such as carpool and bus schedules.

string.name: faq_title
string.translation_description: The title for the tab that shows FAQ.

string.name: settings_title
string.translation_description: Title for the tab that shows all the settings of this app.

TODO: a11y content description for session item actions
TODO: a11y content description for star item actions
TODO: a11y content description for reserve item actions
TODO: a11y content description for login action
TODO: a11y content description for logout action
TODO: a11y content description for video play button

string.name: dialog_sign_in_title
string.translation_description: The title of the dialog. When the user needs to sign in.

resources.string: Sign in to customize your schedule

string.name: dialog_sign_in_content
string.translation_description: The content of the dialog. When the user needs to sign in.

resources.string: Sign in to save events, reserve seats and rate sessions (if an attendee). Actions will be synced from your account across app and site

string.name: not_now
string.translation_description: The description of a button that the user doesn't want to sign in.

string.name: sign_in
string.translation_description: The description of a button to sign in.

item.translation_description: Unit for duration of time by hours. Singular.
Unit for duration of time by hours. Plural.
Unit for duration of time by minutes. Singular.
Unit for duration of time by minutes. Plural.

string.name: menu_item_share_session
string.translation_description: The label for the button to share this session on SNS, etc.

string.name: share_text_session_detail
string.translation_description: The default message to be used when user is sharing an I/O session on SNS, etc.

string.name: intent_chooser_session_detail
string.translation_description: The label for share screen where user can tell people about an I/O session on SNS, etc.

string.name: onboarding_get_started
string.translation_description: The label for the button to start using the app.

string.name: onboarding_welcome_to_google_i_o
string.translation_description: The welcome message shown at the onboarding screen of the app.

string.name: onboarding_date_location
string.translation_description: The date and the place of Google I/O 2018.

string.name: onboarding_build_schedule
string.translation_description: The explanation title of the feature where user can choose which sessions to attend.

string.name: onboarding_build_sched_benefits
string.translation_description: The explanation of the feature where user can choose which sessions to attend.

resources.string: Build your custom I/O experience and reserve seats if you\'re an attendee

string.name: onboarding_watch_live
string.translation_description: The explanation title of the feature where user can watch I/O sessions by live stream.

string.name: onboarding_join_online
string.translation_description: The explanation of the feature where user can watch I/O sessions by live stream.

resources.string: Join us online. We\'ll be streaming the keynotes and most sessions live.

string.name: onboarding_label_days
string.translation_description: The label for the display of the number of days until the conference starts

string.name: onboarding_label_hours
string.translation_description: The label for the display of the number of hours until the conference starts

string.name: onboarding_label_mins
string.translation_description: The label for the display of the number of minutes until the conference starts

string.name: onboarding_label_seconds
string.translation_description: The label for the display of the number of seconds until the conference starts
